pt_br.bio:

en_us.thank_you: I'm very grateful to everyone who believes in my work, who is or has been supporting me. Thank you so much to all of you, you all makes the difference! And if you are not yet a {{ sponsor }}, please consider becoming one.
en_us.title: Title
en_us.aura_description: A beautiful dark theme for your favorite apps.
en_us.electron_router_dom_description: A react-router-dom adapter for Electron apps.
en_us.electron_app_description: A fast and ready-to-go with a well-thought-out structure Electron app boilerplate with ReactJS, TypeScript, CSS / SASS modules, Electron Vite, Eslint, Prettier, GitHub Action releases and more.
en_us.discord_guardian_action_description: An action that fetches the list of malicious domains on Discord in different providers and creates/updates a JSON file with them from time to time.
en_us.discord_malicious_domains_description: A list of malicious domains on Discord using the Discord Guardian Action.
en_us.use_exit_intent_description: A React Hook to handle exit intent strategies.
en_us.yout_description: YoutPlayer is the new way to watch playlists from YouTube on Desktop. No YouTube ads, simple to use, floating window. Available for free for Linux, Mac and Windows.
en_us.netflix_list_exporter_description: An Extension to export your lists from Netflix to Clipboard area and share with your friends.
en_us.electron_screen_recorder_description: A Desktop screen recorder app built using web technologies for Mac, Linux and Windows.
en_us.uni_description: A universal and optimized interface for handle package managers on Linux distributions.
en_us.recipes_for_uni_description: The main recipes repository for UNI. You can create your own or use one of the available recipes.
en_us.hyperinit_description: The ultimate and most complete extension to initialize commands before and after Hyper terminal starts.
en_us.pepper_description: A free and open source simple game that looks like Flappy Bird written in HTML5 and JavaScript.
en_us.omeletetabs_description: An Extension that brings the latest news from omelete.com.br to the browser tabs.
en_us.bio:
üëã Hi, I'm Dalton. I have {YEARS_CODING} years of experience in software development. Also, I'm a writer and designer. 

Currently, I have focused a lot on the Javascript/TypeScript ecosystem. I have projects in ReactJS, React Native, Node, Electron and vanilla Javascript, but I'm always open to discover new things. 

I'm a lover of the open source community and I contribute to it whenever possible. üíú
